name: Logical Gate
description:
Logical Gate is a Puzzle Game create witch Puzzle Script where you have to activate the Reciver with some wire cable.

Controls
Arrow Key - Move
X - Activate the emitter
Z - Cancel action

Play it on Puzzlescript (mobile support)
Hack the code

If you create some level, you can share it in the comment, I add it to the game!

If you like the game you can support me on Ko-Fi!
